entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a calm and fearless character who continues his stroll up the hall despite the danger. He is described as walking towards Voldemort as though nothing had happened to interrupt his stroll.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is introduced as a character who is forced to conjure a shield to deflect an attack. He is described as having scarlet eyes and snarling at Dumbledore.

entities.name: guard
entities.description: The guard is introduced as a character who feels his hair stand on end when the spell passes, indicating that he is affected by it.

relationships.description: Dumbledore continues to walk towards Voldemort as though nothing had happened to interrupt his stroll, indicating that he is approaching him.
Voldemort conjures a shield to deflect an attack from Dumbledore, indicating that he is defending himself against Dumbledore's spell.
